gamerule.maxEnchantmentLevel.description: The maximum enchantment level allowed. 0 disables the mod entirely
gamerule.noIncompatibilities.description: Allows you to combine mutually exclusive enchantments like Infinity and Mending together. Fortune and Silk Touch is not supported
gamerule.rebalancedTrades.description: Rebalances librarian villager trades for higher enchantment levels. Recommended if maxEnchantmentLevel is higher than 10
gamerule.showActualNumbers.description: Shows the actual level of an enchantment near the roman numerals if enabled
